title.rendered: Tourism for Future – Eco Labels Accommodation Standards Awareness Raising Campaign – Peja

content.rendered:
Tourism for Future - Eco Labels Accommodation Standards Awareness Raising Campaign - Peja

Tourism for Future continues with the organization of workshops for raising awareness and informing about International Eco Labels Standards for tourist accommodation businesses.  The initiative recently extended its outreach to the educational sector by engaging students from the “Ali Hadri” vocational high school, a renowned institution specializing in Tourism and Hotel Management. The workshops, targeting the senior class of twelfth grade, covered an array of critical topics that are essential for nurturing a sustainable tourism culture.

The lecture covered topics such as:

✅ Benefits,

✅ Criteria,

✅ Branding,

✅ Sustainability,

✅ Cultural heritage,

✅ Certification

 

This educational endeavor underscores Tourism for Future’s commitment to fostering a new generation of tourism professionals who are well-versed in environmental sustainability. By integrating these values into the curriculum, the organization aims to ensure that the future leaders of the tourism industry are equipped with the knowledge and skills necessary to make a positive impact on the environment.
